short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any webpage including PDF files to dark theme and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a versatile web extension for seamless theme conversion.

With this extension, transform any web page, including PDF files, effortlessly into a dark theme, and vice versa.

Switch between three theme options – Light, Dark, and System – with a simple button click for instant customization.

Encounter any issues? Simply open an issue on the Extension's GitHub Repo at https://github.com/sharma66mahesh/ShadowShift/issues for prompt resolution.
